titleStmt.title: By the Parliament. The Parliament for divers weighty reasons to them appearing, do declare and order, that the circuits for holding of assize, and tryals of nisi prius, for the several counties of England and Wales, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater, and John Macock, Printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An Order of Parliament "that the circuits for holding of assize for England and Wales be not held this present vacation of Lent."
Order to print dated: Saturday, February, 25. 1659. Signed: Thomas St Nicholas, Clerk of the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
